author: Special Correspondent
text:
Southern Railway has temporarily augmented the following trains with one AC 3-tier coach:

Train No.12666/12665 Kanyakumari-Howrah-Kanyakumari weekly express trains will be augmented with the AC coach from Kanyakumari from March 19 to June 18, and from Howrah from March 21 to June 20.

Train No.16340/16339 Nagercoil-Mumbai Chathrapathi Sivaji Terminus (CST)-Nagercoil express trains will be augmented with the AC coach from Nagercoil from March 18 to June 17, and from Mumbai CST from March 20 to June 19.

Train No.16352/16351 Nagercoil-Mumbai CST-Nagercoil bi-weekly express trains will be augmented from Nagercoil from March 24 to June 18, and from Mumbai CST from March 26 to June 20.

Train No.12667/12668 Chennai Egmore-Nagercoil-Chennai Egmore weekly express trains will be augmented from Chennai Egmore from March 17 to June 16 and from Nagercoil from March 18 to June 17.
title: Trains augmented temporarily with AC 3-tier coach
